containerDefinitions.name: leantime
command: echo "<?php class Configuration { public \$dbHost = '10.100.1.137'; public \$dbUser = 'admin'; public \$dbPassword = 'awskeren'; public \$dbDatabase = 'mysql'; public \$dbPort = '3306'; public \$appUrl = 'http://localhost'; public \$sitename = 'LKS Leantime'; public \$language = 'en-US'; public \$theme = 'default'; } ?>" > /var/www/html/config/configuration.php && /usr/bin/supervisord -c /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf
